price: په هغه ورځ چې څوك له عذابه وژغورل شو نو پر هغه الله ډېر لوى رحم وكړ او همدا څرګند برياليتوب دى.
arabic: مَّن يُصۡرَفۡ عَنۡهُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَقَدۡ رَحِمَهُۥۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: man yuṣ'raf ʿanhu yawma-idhin faqad raḥimahu wadhālika al-fawzu al-mubīnu
